page.title: 04NORFROST FACTORY,CASTLETOWN
page.content: The Norfrost freezer factory in Castletown started life in an old Nissen hut with 3 workers in 1971.The first freezers were produced in 1974. Now,10 years on,the factory building is about 74,000 sq.feet and employs 110 workers .2 000 freezers are produced each week and it is hoped to increase this to 4 000.The factory's annual turnover is Â£6 000 000 and the profit is about Â£1 000 000.Freezers are sold to many different countries such as Denmark,France,Australia, America,Pakistan,Dubai and Kuwait. Different freezers are produced to suit the differing climates of these countries. The factory makes its own tools, generates its own electricity and transports its own freezers.The success of the factory is based on these factors and a lot of hard work.
